title: Veggie Fried Rice
ingredients: ['750ml (1 1/4 pints) water', '150g (5 oz ) easy cook brown rice', '2 tablespoons groundnut or sesame oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 small green pepper, chopped', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1/4 teaspoon crushed chilli flakes', '3 spring onions, thinly sliced', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', 'Frozen or fresh garden peas', '2 tablespoons chopped peanuts']
